articles.description: All the latest and reaction to the first leg of the EFL Cup semi-final between Arsenal and Newcastle, plus West Ham manager latest.
articles.title: EFL Cup reaction: Newcastle beat Arsenal in semi-final first leg

articles.description: Tiger Woods says TGL will take golf into a new "stratosphere". Here are five takeaways from the opening night's action in Florida.
articles.title: TGL: Tiger Woods and Rory McIlroy's indoor golf league starts in Florida

articles.description: The Belgian Grand Prix secures a new contract that will keep it on the Formula 1 calendar for four out of six years from 2026-2031.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix signs new Formula 1 deal to host races for four out of six years from 2026-2031

articles.description: Las Vegas Raiders' Antonio Pierce becomes the third NFL head coach to be fired following the end of the regular season.
articles.title: Las Vegas Raiders: Head coach Antonio Pierce sacked after regular NFL season

articles.description: Mikel Arteta still believes Arsenal can reach the Carabao Cup final - but says they must first master the "tricky" football used in the competition.
articles.title: Arsenal 0-2 Newcastle: Mikel Arteta says Carabao Cup footballs are 'tricky'

articles.description: England could be without Immanuel Feyi-Waboso for the Six Nations if Exeter wing opts for surgery on his shoulder.
articles.title: Immanuel Feyi-Waboso: England wing could be ruled out of Six Nations

articles.description: France's World Cup-winning manager Didier Deschamps says he will step down after the 2026 tournament in the United States, Canada and Mexico.
articles.title: Didier Deschamps: France manager to step down after 2026 World Cup

articles.description: At Arsenal, Tottenham and Liverpool, Damien Comolli helped sign Thierry Henry, Robin van Persie, Gareth Bale, Luka Modric and Luis Suarez. Now he is shaping Toulouse's future.
articles.title: Damien Comolli: How the man who signed Henry, Bale & Suarez is reshaping Toulouse

articles.description: Trae Young scores a dramatic buzzer-beater to earn the Atlanta Hawks a thrilling 124-121 win over the Utah Jazz in the NBA.
articles.title: NBA: Trae Young's buzzer-beater seals win for Atlanta Hawks against Utah Jazz

articles.description: Rugby needs to rethink its culture if it is to capture a slice of the lucrative American sports market, according to an agent with a foothold in both.
articles.title: Can rugby union break America as Rugby World Cup heads to USA?
